title: An Act providing for a study relative to the necessity of certain snow safety procedures

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Galvin of Canton, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 2613) of William C. Galvin that the Executive Office of Public Safety and Security conduct a study evaluating the necessity and feasibility of implementing certain snow safety procedures relative to rooftop snowfall and fire hydrant accessibility.  Public Safety and Homeland Security.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Public Safety and Homeland Security

related_entities.name: committee on Public Safety and Homeland Security

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 04/09/2025 from 10:00 AM-12:00 PM in A-1 & A-2
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on House Ways and Means

related_entities.name: the committee on House Ways and Means
committee on House Ways and Means
